short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to assist with judging yo-yo performances on Youtube.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension enhances YouTube for yo-yo performance judging!

Judge routines using the provided buttons or customizable keyboard shortcuts, and share your results through the export and import features, with the ability to playback a recording of the judging process.
